attributes.title: This app is so bad
attributes.review: It made my phone glitch so bad and it took so long to download. Just like everyone else, I have perfectly functional internet so there is no reason why this should have happened. It must have faulty software because it basically doesn’t work at all.

attributes.title: My cat chocked on a orange because of this app!!😡
attributes.review: My cat saw president 🍊 or the screen while i was eating cheetos, suddenly she put her head inside the bag and start to eat five cheetos at once. I assume she associated the orange thing on my screen with the cheetos and wanted to die immediately. I sadly could not save her and she got yeeted into the lake, i hope you are happy with this murder..

attributes.title: THIS APP IS BUTTCHEEKS
attributes.review: it took SO LONG to download. The app literally hacked into my imessages and sent it’s link to everyone in my contacts. I don’t appreciate that AT ALL. I am very angry. It made snapchat, instagram, tumblr, and all my other social media apps malfunction and glitch. The entire app is so bugged, i could hardly do anything. Totally unhelpful and not worth the purchase.

attributes.title: to my big fluffy orange..
attributes.review: IM HERE TO SAY THIS APP IS OUTRAGEOUSLY HORRIBLE 🤬 IT FIRST OFF GAVE ME AIDS, CHLAMYDIA, CRABS, STDS, HERPES, AND ANYTHING ELSE UOU CAN THINK OF 😱 so please i highly recommend taking this off of the app store 🤪 i’ve heard of others that they experienced the same or worse 😔 i’ve even heard that ninjas attacked him because of this app 😢 so if you have common sense don’t download this app or even better take this app off of the app store 🤗

attributes.title: this is terrible
attributes.review: This app was so bad my god....I opened the app and immediately was faced with a rotten orange man. This app made my phone have a seizure because it saw the stank orange. Apple I cannot believe you allowed such an app on here.... my mom saw that I had this app downloaded and wanted to ground me for having such garbage on here...I’m disappointed you let this slide

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP‼️‼️
attributes.review: this app is terrible it has so many glitches and everytime i open it my phone glitches and sometimes it even turns off this app needs to get off the app store because i think it a hacking app because once when i opened it my whole phone turned off

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 😒
attributes.review: Took forever to download and whenever I got on it it would glitch out! Terrible app, terrible service, and horrible design. When I finally got onto the app I was bombarded by millions of ads. Disgusting ads. I just want to support my orange tanned corn hair fugley ugly racist president 🥺 Well no matter, this app is rated low anyways what did I expect! Deleting.

attributes.title: Disappointed 👎
attributes.review: Apparently this app is not only anti abortion but also anti black lives!! The second I opened the app I saw a man with over 25+ sexual assault allegations!!!! 😡😡!! DISAPPOINTING! This is outrageous and disgusting! I cant believe they let a man like that model for Donald Trumps app! Not to mention his tan was so orange and he was so wrinkly, ugly ugly man! That wrinkly old orange must know Donald Trump to be able to model on his app🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: It gave me a brain aneurysm
attributes.review: It all started when I read “do you want trump to win the 2020 election?” My head started to pulsating and my nose started bleeding. I felt nauseous. Worst experience ever!!!! Never using it again nor and I’m voting for the Cheeto puff!!!! Not only that but it’s just slow. Overall it needs work and so does our president. 😗

attributes.title: My thoughts on this app..,
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible!!! When I tried to log in it kept taking me back to my home screen and when I got into the app it it kept lagging around and just would not work for me. And also Apple, please take this app off of your AppStore it’s making you look bad.
